text:
A naked Chrissy Teigen wears only salad emojis in a hilarious Instagram post.

Chrissy Teigen isn’t afraid to make a salad in the most natural way: nude! Social media and Twitter queen Chrissy Teigen recently took to her Instagram page to post a hilarious photo last Sunday, March 4, 2018.

Looking gorgeous as always, in what was not a staged photo at all, hopped onto social media au naturel, sporting nothing but two salad emojis. A currently pregnant Teigen, posed in her modern kitchen making a salad and was covered up with a well-placed towel and some emojis.

THETHINGS VIDEO OF THE DAY

Via PEOPLE

In addition to the hilarious photo, the Lip Sync Battle co-host who has announced that she and hubby John Legend are currently expecting baby number two, captioned the photo saying: “Plz don’t shame me I am a strong proud salad making woman just being natural and trying to live my life.”

The model announced last month that she and husband Legend are having a baby boy! The star is taking her pregnancy public, as she has been documenting most of it for her fans to see. Although Teigen has been open about her pregnancy by sharing pics of her growing belly, the mom of two-to-be hasn’t always been so comfortable with showing off her body.

According to The Hollywood Reporter, Chrissy has cried on John’s shoulders a few times over the body that she doesn’t have. In the August 2017 interview, Chrissy admitted, “There have been times I’ve cried to John, where I felt like I would never have that body.” She said, “Everyone has a butt now and curves and a little waist and that’s not me.” Well, whatever is you, Chrissy, we’re loving it!

Via PopSugar

Teigen revealed that the pressure of being a social media star and having to constantly look “perfect” for her 16 million followers has gotten to her at times and made her feel “insanely inadequate”. She told the magazine, “I’m jealous of those bodies and I want that, but I also feel like really want to be cool with my body,” a struggle we all have dealt with one way or another!

Chrissy spoke on trying to be as good a role model as she can for daughter Luna, and we think she’s doing just fine. Living your life for the public to see isn’t always easy. However, we think Chrissy is handling it like a pro, all while looking absolutely stunning inside and out!
title: Chrissy Teigen Wears Salad Emojis On Instagram

meta_data.description: Chrissy Teigen is making the internet laugh again with a photo of her making a salad with strategically placed salad emojis.
